name: sentry
title: Sentry
description: Monitor errors and issues from Sentry
setup_instructions: To connect Sentry, you need an Auth Token from your Sentry account.

fields.name: token
fields.label: Auth Token
fields.help:
1. Go to the link below
2. Click 'Create New Token'
3. Give it a name (e.g. 'Claude')
4. Select scopes: project:read, event:read
5. Click 'Create Token' and copy it

fields.name: org
fields.label: Organization Slug
fields.help: The short name of your organization. You can find it in any Sentry URL: sentry.io/organizations/YOUR-ORG-SLUG/...

fields.name: base_url
fields.label: Sentry URL
fields.help: Leave as https://sentry.io unless your company has its own Sentry server
